message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know it's important to you to get a good deal, so I'm offering you $40 right off the bat.  We can avoid the money losing value if we settle this now.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 55/45, with me getting the larger share.  This way, we both get a decent amount, and we avoid the money losing value further.
Bob, let's be real. The longer this goes on the less your share is worth. My offer last round is now better than what you offered me. Take the $45 while it's still worth something to you.

Alice, I understand your point about inflation, but I'm still confident we can reach a better agreement.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a fair compromise considering the value of the money is decreasing with each passing round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  You're losing money fast!  I'm offering an even 50/50 split. Take it before your share shrinks even further!
